E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1989
Subject: Progress of Mel Rojas
Dear Sir,
Mel Rojas has nothing more to prove at A Hagerstown Suns!
He has an ERA of 1.25 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,

Date: Tuesday, 8/19/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Al Holland



Date: Sunday, 8/24/1989
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Bob Shirley
